title: Fund your Testnet Account
addFundsText:
Enter the address of your Alfajores Testnet account to receive additional funds. Each request adds 10 cUSD and 5 CELO.

In the Celo Wallet, you can find your address by pressing the menu icon at the top left and scrolling down to bottom. Press the address to copy it to your device’s clipboard.
getTestnetText: If you have an Android or iOS device, you can set up a funded account on the Alfajores Testnet by requesting a <0>Celo Wallet invite</0>. You can also <2>create an account via the command line<2>.
buildLocallyText: Follow these instructions to build the Wallet from source, pointed at the Alfajores Testnet.
youCanUse: You can access an existing account from the Celo Wallet by pressing 'Restore Existing Wallet' on the Invite Code screen and entering your seed phrase.
checkYourBalance: Check your balance and transaction history
interestedInNode: Interested in running your own node?
faucetError: Unable to faucet - check your address and please try again
askQustionsOnForum: Get Help from the Celo Community.
findAnswers: Find answers and ask questions in the Forum
downloadDirect:
TEMPORARILY Unavailable. 
Units in this wallet have no real value.
